metadata.synopsis: An AD one-liner that will show Gale feeling the presence of the Karsus netherese cursed tome, if he gets close to the rare book area and the book is near. This should prompt the player to get this book.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter the trigger S_LOW_KarsusTomeADGaleTrigger, at CTY_Main_A 8; 26; -92, with the Karsus tome in it.

0.speaker: Gale
0.text: Look - a bookseller. She can point us to the tome I need.
0.context: NodeContext: Spotting a book seller at the back of the shop. Determined - we need to go there.
